meanings.sent1: That numbnuts forgot his keys again.
meanings.sent2: Don't be such a numbnuts and pay attention in class.
meanings.sent3: The numbnuts tried to use a fork to eat soup.
meanings.sent4: His brain must be made of numbnuts to make such a silly mistake.
meanings.sent5: He's a walking example of a numbnuts, always getting into trouble.

meanings.definition: A person who lacks intelligence or common sense.
meanings.sent1: The numbnuts couldn't figure out how to open the door.
meanings.sent2: I can't believe that numbnuts tried to pet a wild bear.
meanings.sent3: The numbnuts thought it was a good idea to swim with sharks.
meanings.sent4: She's a real numbnuts when it comes to following directions.
meanings.sent5: He proved himself to be a true numbnuts by putting salt in his coffee.
